name: conscious
content:
conscious adjective
(NOTICING)
be conscious of something/someone
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 to notice that a particular thing or person exists or is present: My tooth doesn't exactly hurt, but I'm conscious of it (= I can feel it) all the time.
See more
conscious adjective
(AWAKE)
C1 awake, thinking, and knowing what is happening around you: He's still conscious but he's very badly injured. She's out of the operating theatre, but she's not fully conscious yet.figurative humorous "Can I speak to Isobel, please?" "She's still in bed. I'll go and see if she's conscious (= awake) yet." Opposite
unconscious
